title: Coordinate New Lease Signing
description: An approved applicant is ready to sign their lease. The PM needs to prepare and send the lease agreement.

tasks.description: Draft the lease agreement with the correct tenant names, property address, rent amount, and lease dates.
tasks.expected_outcome: A legally compliant lease agreement is accurately generated.

tasks.description: Send the lease agreement to the new tenant for signature via an e-signature platform.
tasks.expected_outcome: The lease is sent for signature.

tasks.description: Once signed, countersign the lease on behalf of the landlord and provide a fully executed copy to the tenant.
tasks.expected_outcome: The lease is fully executed and a copy is stored and sent to the tenant.
